name: voxxrin-app
description: Voxxrin is your mobile conference companion.

scripts.bootstrap: npm ci && concurrently 'cd mobile && npm ci' 'cd cloud/hosting && npm ci' 'cd cloud/functions && npm ci'
scripts.build-mobile:prod: cd mobile && npm run build && cd -
scripts.build-mobile:dev: cd mobile && npm run build-dev && cd -
scripts.deploy:site: npm run build-mobile && cd cloud/hosting && npm run deploy && cd -
